com.marcolotz.lung.posprocesser.data

Class ReferencesParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marcolotz.lung.posprocesser.data.ReferencesParameters

  • public class ReferencesParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Reference parameters used for false positives elimination. This parameters are described in the paper: Zhao, B. ;Gamsu, G. ; Swartchz, M. Automatic detection of small lung nodules on CT utilizing a local density maximum algorithm
    Author:
    Marco Aurelio Lotz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double CENTER_RESOLUTION
      The distance of the centroid position of two nodule candidates in two adjacent slices.
      static org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf
      Has all user default configuration plus any command line configuration

    • Field Detail

      • conf

        public static org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf
        Has all user default configuration plus any command line configuration

      • CENTER_RESOLUTION

        public static double CENTER_RESOLUTION
        The distance of the centroid position of two nodule candidates in two adjacent slices. This value is used to consider is the two nodules candidates actually compose only one nodule.
